scripts.build: npm run clean && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -s arbitrary -t [ babelify ] src/index.js -o docs/lib/index.js -p mapstraction --debug
scripts.watch: npm run clean && ./node_modules/.bin/watchify -s arbitrary src/index.js -t [ babelify ] -o docs/lib/index.js -p mapstraction --debug
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
